observacion: Public File Manager website. On this website you could upload and store a few kind of files(supports audio,video,images,text formats), your free account sign up just takes you 2 minutes.
Github repository with fifteen Javascript practice project, each project has been host on Netlify deployment platform

Public API created with Slim Framework. Gives an updated list of venezuelan banks info(contact number, website, email,etc.). Sometimes, it's difficult to do a mobile payment in Venezuela because of we don't have the bank code for it, on this API you could find all codes of existing banks
Fetching Rick And Morty API and showing on simple lists of characters, episodes and locations related with TV show
